Package com.google.crypto.tink.hybrid.internal

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HpkeAead
    Interface for Hybrid Public Key Encryption (HPKE) authenticated encryption with associated data (AEAD).
    HpkeKdf
    Interface for Hybrid Public Key Encryption (HPKE) key derivation function (KDF).
    HpkeKem
    Interface for Hybrid Public Key Encryption (HPKE) key encapsulation mechanism (KEM).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AesGcmHpkeAead
    AES-GCM HPKE AEAD variant.
    ChaCha20Poly1305HpkeAead
    ChaCha20-Poly1305 HPKE AEAD variant.
    HkdfHpkeKdf
    HKDF HPKE KDF variant.
    HpkeContext
    Hybrid Public Key Encryption (HPKE) context for either a sender or a recipient.
    HpkeDecrypt
    Hybrid Public Key Encryption (HPKE) decryption.
    HpkeEncrypt
    Hybrid Public Key Encryption (HPKE) encryption.
    HpkeKemEncapOutput
    Helper class that wraps output from HPKE KEM Encap() method.
    HpkePrimitiveFactory
    Helper class for creating HPKE primitives from either algorithm identifiers or HpkeParams.
    HpkePrivateKeyManager
    Key manager that generates new HpkePrivateKey keys and produces new instances of HpkeDecrypt primitives.
    HpkePublicKeyManager
    Key manager that produces new instances of HpkeEncrypt primitive.
    HpkeUtil
    Collection of helper functions for HPKE.
    X25519HpkeKem
    Diffie-Hellman-based X25519 HPKE KEM variant.
